Name: Royal Mojito
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
ADD first 4 ingredients to glass and two-thirds fill with crushed ice.
Fill glass with more crushed ice.
Review: A Mojito topped with a splash of fizz instead of soda water. There's posh!
History: Mojito cocktail history and other variations .
